question: Which Union Ministry along with Atal Innovation Mission has launched “Digital India AatmaNirbhar Bharat App Innovation Challenge”?
option1: Ministry of Human Resources and Development
option4: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation:
Union Ministry of Electronics and IT (MeitY) in partnership with Atal Innovation Mission, Niti Aayog has launched Digital India AatmaNirbhar Bharat App Innovation Challenge.
The challenge seeks to support and build a strong ecosystem for Indian applications. In its first phase, the challenge will identify the potential Indian Apps that are being used, that are capable of becoming world class apps. The second phase will focus on developing new applications.
